features: 【Multi Occasions】Wherever you are,this Footrest will give a super comfort to your feet.The hanging footrest will relieve the stress on your back,knees,improves body circulation.Works great in working a whole day at office,traveling by airplane,train,bus,steamboat and self-driving tour rest.Making you work relaxed and travel more enjoyable.

【Lightweight and Compact】Weight:3.2oz (90g),folded size 8.66*2.36*1.97 inch.This space-saving designed easily fits into your carry-on luggage or favorite flight travel bag.Includes a handy drawstring carry bag.If you have too much stuffs to handle and have no space to place your airplane foot rest.Just hang on the luggage case or thrown into the backpack without taking too much space or adding too much weight.

【High Quality Travel Gadgets】This airplane footrest is crafted with high-quality soft cotton material,greatly enhance your travel experience.It’s like sitting in a recliner with your feet resting on pillows.It use three nails and two straps to form a triangle,more sturdy and durable,and we also added a lock to reinforce the strap.

【Longer Adjustable Straps】Adjustable strap designed to suit exactly your height,the min length 22.83”to the max length 33.85”(appr.)The travel footrest suitable for different people,whether you are men,women,kids,adult or child.

【Easy To Use & Install】Just hook the string part of the footrest onto sides of any desk,and place your feet in footrest.Enjoy it with the tray table up or down.Adjustable straps allows for the perfect length to provide the necessary support.To use as a foot rest under desk at work,suspend strap ends under desk on hook (30 pounds minimum load,heavy duty adhesive hook recommended) and adjust for desired length.NOTE:Hooks not included！

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Foot Rest,Airplane Footrest Made with Premium Foam,Head Hammock Portable Travel Footrest Flight Carry-On Foot Rest Adjustable Height Foot Rest Travel Accessories Footrests Hammock,Black

Common Problems In The Use Of Foot Hanging: 1.A few airlines may not allow it. 2.Economy class has limited space,so you need to consider your height,weight and foot size to avoid affecting the user experience. 3.It may disturb the front passenger. According to the customer's feedback that the foot is not strong,it may be damaged due to excessive force,we provide return and replacement service.

Airplane Footrest with High Quality ●This airplane footrest is crafted with high-quality soft cotton material,greatly enhance your travel experience.It's like sitting in a recliner with your feet resting on pillows. ●Adjustable strap designed to suit exactly your height,the min length 22.83”to the max length 33.85”(appr.)The travel footrest suitable for different people,whether you are men,women,kids,adult or child.

How To Use It? 1.Hook the string part of the footrest to the table 2.Snap the buckle (PU leather inward,and oxford fabric outward) 3.Lengthening your feet,float your legs,swing your legs to relieve fatigue 4.Enjoy your time during using it

Where To Use? Make A Big Diffirence Any time any where-can be use in office,School,bus,train,long-distance airway.With it,you can release your feet,This foot rest makes a wonderful gift for the Travelers in your life! Not Just For Airplanes! ●As a portable foot rest ●As a foot rest under your desk at work,at home or in the office ●As a travel hammock in a car,truck,SUV,bus,train,or anywhere else where you can attach its adjustable strap.

Product Characteristics Potential Health Benefits ●Improving blood circulation ●Enabling knee and leg support ●Preventing heavy, restless and swollen legs ●Preventing DVT (Deep Vein Thrombosis) ●Sleeping more comfortably in a seated position ●Reducing stress on your back, knees and ankles ●Arriving well rested at your destination Product Specifications: Folded Size:8.66*2.36*1.97 inch Weight :3.2 oz Total Length:70.08”/178cm (long enough to adjust to suitable height) Surface Material: inner suede fabric&foam Back Material:sturdy and waterproof oxford material Strap: High density strong nylon Flat size: 17.32" x 8.46" Packaging:1 Foot Rest+1 Portable Bag Portable & Easy to Carry Easily fold the foot hammock to handled size.It is light-weighted and you can put it in your bags and carry it to anywhere you want
Cotton Memory Foam Material Cotton Memory Foam Feature Breathable Premium Memory Foam

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked great for me
reviews.reviewText: Airlines do not let you use this during take off and landing IF you have the tray in front of you down while using it. I put the trash down to clip it, then closed the tray back up. Simple. You do need to bed mindful of others in front of you as a lot of movement will disturb them. Be kind. I do agree with others that having something soft for between the feet may help bone on bone contact from feet. Otherwise it helped my back tremendously. Those that say there wasn't any adjustable clip or it was too short may have missed it not received the connector strap. Happy purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Worked as intended
reviews.reviewText: I’m on the short side so this is very useful for me. Took a 14hr flight and this offers great support, adjustable height, plus packable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this for long flights.
reviews.reviewText: Works great - just need to remember to remove your legs from sling when you put your food tray down or it will come down with lots of force. It attaches easily to the tray and can be adjusted as needed throughout your flight. I enjoyed swinging my legs even just a little to help with circulation. You do need to move your feet around a bit to keep them from getting sore pushed up against each other. I would put a piece of clothing or thin blanket btwn your feet to add a bit of cushioning. Great product - highly recommend trying it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The seller sent me tips about the product that informed me the airplane might not allow the product. It may bother the person in front of you and it might break. Very disappointing!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars No adjustable straps - unusable
reviews.reviewText: There was no adjustable straps, so it was impossible to use. I opened it on the airplane and unfortunately I had to throw it directly into the trash because it was unusable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I am 5ft 3in and my feet have a hard time touching the floor on the plane and even then I have to stretch. So this leg hammock was amazing. It lifted my legs making it comfortable. So easy to set up and easy to pack in my cary on. Worth every penny!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely need the one with separate places for each feet
reviews.reviewText: I bought a few different ones and definitely felt the one with separation between feet was more comfortable. Without separation, the feet got piled together making it uncomfortable.I used this item on my international trip, in flights that were about 10 hours long. I am 5'3" and found it really made my trip more comfortable and I had less lower back pain and less leg/calf fatigue.Unfortunately, upon my return I tried to order another one for my mother and found that the same product is not available and instead the seller takes me to a hammock foot rest without the separation when I follow the product link.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheap way to improve your life
reviews.reviewText: I always want to put my feet up a little when flying and now I can, without bothering my neighbor. This thing feels pretty cheap in quality and I'll be surprised if it lasts for a long long time, but considering that I don't need to use it all that often, I decided to keep it and so far it's really improving my comfort while flying.

reviews.reviewTitle: Only one foot, leg at a time
reviews.reviewText: Fits comfortably for one foot/leg at a time. However it works as pictured, comes as ordered. I am happy to have it. Order two and you should be fine.
Funciona para niños y personas de muy baja estatura. Si mides más de 1.60 dudo que lo puedas usar. Buena calidad pero no tiene sentido comprarlo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have now made several long haul flights in economy with these. I wouldn't travel without them! They make such a difference to the comfort of the flight. The adjustable straps are brilliant so you can always find a position which is comfortable, and they are so easy to use!
Para viajes largos en avión, piernas más en alto y mejor descanso
